text:
e="preserve">Mike Sertich (July 18, 1921 – August 24, 2020) was an American ice hockey coach. He was the head coach of Minnesota-Duluth from 1983 through to 2000. He continued coaching for several years after resigning. His career began in 1982 and he retired in 2012. Sertich was born in Virginia, Minnesota.
Sertich died on 24 August 2020 in Duluth, Minnesota at the age of 99.
